mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM pns.pns a WHERE a.PNSGID=#{pnsgid} AND a.PNSID=#{pnsid} AND a.SIDE=#{side} AND a.STATUS IN ('PUBLISHED', 'HALF_TRADED')

SELECT a.OID PNSOID, a.POID,customer.USERNAME PONAME, a.PRICE, a.QUANT, a.NET, a.MAX, a.MIN FROM pns.pns a INNER JOIN crm.customer ON a.POID=crm.customer.ID WHERE a.SIDE=#{side} AND a.PNSGID=#{pnsgid} AND a.PNSID=#{pnsid} AND a.STATUS IN ('PUBLISHED', 'HALF_TRADED') ORDER BY a.PRICE ASC LIMIT #{num}, 10

SELECT a.OID PNSOID, a.POID,customer.USERNAME PONAME, a.PRICE, a.QUANT, a.NET, a.MAX, a.MIN FROM pns.pns a INNER JOIN crm.customer ON a.POID=crm.customer.ID WHERE a.SIDE=#{side} AND a.PNSGID=#{pnsgid} AND a.PNSID=#{pnsid} AND a.STATUS IN ('PUBLISHED', 'HALF_TRADED') ORDER BY a.PRICE DESC LIMIT #{num}, 10
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM pns.pns a WHERE a.POID=#{poid} AND a.PNSGID=#{pnsgid} AND a.PNSID=#{pnsid} AND a.SIDE=#{side}

SELECT OID PNSOID,POID,PRICE,QUANT,TRADED,MARGIN,NET,CAN,MAX,MIN,STATUS FROM pns.pns a WHERE a.POID=#{poid} AND a.SIDE=#{side} AND a.PNSGID=#{pnsgid} AND a.PNSID=#{pnsid} ORDER BY FIELD('PUBLISHED','HALF_TRADED','FULL_LOCKED','FULL_TRADED','CANCELLED','HALF_CANCELLED','UNKNOWN') LIMIT #{num}, 10
